The Enrich Layer tool enhances the input features with demographic and landscape data.

The point, line, or polygon features that will be enriched with additional data.

The count of features depends on additional factors such as filtering criteria and the analysis extent.

The variables that will be added as attributes to the input features.

The method that will be used to create the bounding areas around the input point or line features. The method can be a straight line distance or a travel mode. The entire area around each feature will be enriched.

A numeric value that specifies the distance or time that the enriched area will extend around each input feature.

The units that will be used to specify the distance or time that the enriched area will extend around each input feature.

Specifies whether the output layer will contain polygon features defined by the Enrichment areas settings (checked) or the input features (unchecked).

The name of the layer that will be created and added to the map.

The name of the folder in My content where the result will be saved.
